title: The Victorian State Schools' Nursery
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development, Cineservice and E.J. Perry
brief_description: Many Victorian schools are noted for their fine gardens. They are supplied by the State Schools’ Nursery at Huntingdale. Here teachers and students receive instruction in horticulture. Commentator: Ray Chapman
creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development, Cineservice and E.J. Perry
